config.introduction: Her er det mogleg å konfigurere dine komponenter og FLH HomeX. Ikkje alt er mogleg å konfigurere frå brukarsnittet endå, men vi jobbar med saka.

advanced_mode.hint_enable: Missing config options? Enable advanced mode on

editor.confirm_unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

areas.caption: Områderegister
areas.description: Oversikt over områda i heimen din.

picker.introduction: Områda vert brukt til å organisere kvar einingar er. Denne informasjonen vil bli brukt av FLH HomeX for å hjelpe deg å organisere brukargrensesnittet, løyver og integrasjoner med andre system.
picker.introduction2: For å plassere ei eining i eit område, bruk linken under for å navigere til integrasjonssida og trykk deretter på konfigurer integrasjon for å opne einingskortet.
picker.no_areas: Looks like you have no areas yet!

editor.name: Namn
editor.no_linked_entities: There are no entities linked to this area.

delete.confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete this area?

tag.caption: Tags
tag.description: Trigger automations when a NFC tag, QR code, etc. is scanned
tag.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove tag {tag}?

detail.name: Name
detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

energy.caption: Energy
energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption

grid.title: Electricity grid
grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows FLH HomeX to track your whole home energy usage.
grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

from.paragraph: Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
from.cost_para: Select how FLH HomeX should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
from.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs
from.cost_entity: Use an entity with current price

to.paragraph: Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
to.cost_para: Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
to.no_cost: I do not get money back
to.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
to.cost_entity: Use an entity with current rate

solar.title: Solar Panels
solar.sub: Let FLH HomeX monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
solar.stat_return_to_grid: Solar energy returned to the grid
solar.stat_predicted_production: Prediction of your solar energy production

battery.title: Home Battery Storage
battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
battery.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

gas.title: Gas Consumption
gas.sub: Let FLH HomeX monitor your gas usage.
gas.learn_more: More information on how to get started.

dialog.paragraph: Gas consumption is the volume of gas that flows to your home.

dialog.cost_stat: Use an entity tracking the total costs

device_consumption.sub: Tracking the energy usage of individual devices allows FLH HomeX to break down your energy usage by device.

core.caption: Generelt

core.introduction: Vi veit at endringar i konfigurasjonen kan vere ein slitsam prosess. Denne delen vil forsøke å gjere livet ditt litt lettare.

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Redigeringsverktøy deaktivert sidan konfigurasjonen er lagra i configuration.yaml

server_control.caption: Serverkontroll
server_control.description: Start om att og stopp FLH HomeX-serveren

validation.heading: Konfigurasjonsvalidering
validation.introduction: Valider konfigurasjonen dersom du nyleg har gjort endringar, og vil vere sikker på at alt er gyldig.

reloading.heading: Konfigurasjonsomlasting
reloading.introduction: Nokre delar av FLH HomeX kan oppdaterast utan ein omstart. Ved å trykke på oppdater, vil FLH HomeX forkaste den gjeldande konfigurasjonen og erstatte den med den nye.

server_management.heading: Serveradministrasjon
server_management.introduction: Kontroller FLH HomeX-serveren din... frå FLH HomeX.

server_management.confirm_stop: Er du sikker på at du ønsker å stoppe FLH HomeX?

customize.caption: Tilpassing

picker.introduction: Modifiser oppføringsattributtane. Dei nyleg lagt til/endra endringane kjem til å bli sett til verks med ein gang. Fjerna endringar kjem i gang når oppføringa er oppdatert.

warning.include_sentence: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
warning.not_applied: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.

customize.attributes_not_set: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.

picker.introduction: Automasjonsredigeringa tillet deg å lage og redigere automasjonar. Ver vennleg og les [instruksjonane](https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) for å vere sikker på om du har konfigurert FLH HomeX rett.
picker.pick_automation: Vel ein automasjon for å redigere
picker.no_automations: Vi klarte ikkje å finne nokon automasjonar som kunne redigerast
picker.only_editable: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
picker.dev_only_editable: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
picker.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?

dialog_new.how: How do you want to create your new automation?

thingtalk.header: Describe the automation you want to create
thingtalk.intro: And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.

editor.introduction: Bruk automasjonar til å gi liv til heimen din
editor.load_error_not_editable: Berre automasjonar i automations.yaml kan redigerast.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Du har endringar som ikkje er lagra. Er du sikker på at du vil forlate?

blueprint.no_inputs: This blueprint doesn't have any inputs.

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

triggers.name: Utløysar
triggers.introduction: Utløysarar er det som startar ein prosess i ein automasjonsregel. Det er mogleg å spesifisere fleire utløysarar for same regel. Når ein utløysar startar, vil FLH HomeX validere føresetnadane, dersom der er nokon, og så setje i gang handlinga.
triggers.id: Trigger ID (used by the trigger condition)
triggers.delete_confirm: Er du sikker på at du vil slette?

conditions.name: Betingelse
conditions.introduction: Føresetnadar er valfrie og vil hindre vidare framgang i automasjonen med mindre alle føresetnadene er møtt.
conditions.delete_confirm: Er du sikker på at du vil slette?

actions.name: Handling
actions.introduction: Handlinga FLH HomeX vil gjennomføre når automasjonen vert utløyst.
actions.delete_confirm: Er du sikker på at du vil slette?

task_selection.introduction: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a FLH HomeX automation.
task_selection.language_note: Note: Only English is supported for now.
task_selection.error_empty: Enter a command or tap skip.
task_selection.error_unsupported: We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).

link_devices.header: Great! Now we need to link some devices

overview.introduction: The blueprint configuration allows you to import and manage your blueprints.

add.error_no_url: Please enter the URL of the blueprint.

picker.introduction: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured FLH HomeX correctly.

editor.id_already_exists_save_error: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
editor.introduction: Use scripts to run a sequence of actions.

modes.label: Modus
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when script is invoked while it is still running from one or more previous invocations. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
editor.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
editor.sequence_sentence: The sequence of actions of this script.

picker.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scene?

editor.introduction: Use scenes to bring your home to life.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
editor.unsaved_confirm: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
editor.name: Name

devices.introduction: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all the devices to the state you want for this scene.

entities.introduction: Entities that do not belong to a device can be set here.
entities.device_entities: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.

cloud.description_features: Kontroller når du ikkje er heime og integrer med Alexa og Google Assistant

login.title: Cloud Login
login.introduction: FLH HomeX Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: This service is run by our partner
login.introduction2a: , a company founded by the founders of FLH HomeX and Hass.io.
login.introduction3: FLH HomeX Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
login.learn_more_link: Learn more about FLH HomeX Cloud
login.alert_password_change_required: You need to change your password before logging in.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: You need to confirm your email before logging in.

forgot_password.title: Gløymt passord
forgot_password.subtitle: Gløymt passordet ditt
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with FLH HomeX Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of FLH HomeX Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of FLH HomeX away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of FLH HomeX and Hass.io.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of FLH HomeX Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for FLH HomeX Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your FLH HomeX instance publicly on the internet.

tts.title: Text to Speech
tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.

dialog.example_message: Hei {name}! Du kan spele kva som heilst tekst på kva som heilst støtta mediaspelar"

remote.title: Remote Control
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: FLH HomeX Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for FLH HomeX Cloud you'll be able to control all your FLH HomeX devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the FLH HomeX skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, FLH HomeX will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for FLH HomeX Cloud you'll be able to control all your FLH HomeX devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the FLH HomeX Cloud skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, FLH HomeX will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
google.enter_pin_hint: Enter a PIN to use security devices
google.sync_entities_404_message: Failed to sync your entities to Google, ask Google 'Hey Google, sync my devices' to sync your entities.
google.not_configured_text: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the FLH HomeX Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to FLH HomeX from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this device?

picker.introduction: FLH HomeX har eit register over alle oppføringane den nokon gang har sett som kan unikt identifiserast. Kvar av desse oppføringane har ein eigen oppføringsidentifikasjon som er reservert for akkurat denne oppføringa.
picker.introduction2: Bruk oppføringsregisteret til å skrive over namn, endre oppføringsidentifikasjonane eller fjerne oppføringar frå FLH HomeX. Merk deg at å fjerne oppføringa i oppføringregisteret ikkje fjernar sjølve oppføringa. For å gjere dette, gå vidare inn på linken under og fjern oppføringa i integrasjonssida.

enable_selected.confirm_text: This will make them available in FLH HomeX again if they are now disabled.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Disabled entities will not be added to FLH HomeX.

remove_selected.confirm_text: You should remove them from your Lovelace config and automations if they contain these entities.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart FLH HomeX before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

person.caption: Personar
person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in FLH HomeX.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Note: people configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any people yet.
person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
person.person_not_found: We couldn't find the person you were trying to edit.

detail.name: Namn
detail.device_tracker_intro: Vel eininga som høyrer til denne personen.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
detail.confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete the user account for {name}? You can still track the user, but the person will no longer be able to login.

zone.caption: Zones
zone.description: Manage the zones you want to track people in
zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any zones yet.
zone.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?
zone.configured_in_yaml: Sonene defingert i configuration.yaml, kan ikkje redigerast via brukargrensesnittet.
zone.edit_home_zone: Plasseringa av heimen din kan endrast i den generelle konfigurasjonen.
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
zone.home_zone_core_config: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?

detail.name: Name
detail.icon_error_msg: Icon should be in the format ''prefix:iconname'', for example: ''mdi:home''
detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

integrations.no_integrations: Ser ut til at du ikkje har nokon integrasjonar konfigurert endå. Trykk på knappen under for å legge til din fyrste integrasjon!
integrations.note_about_integrations: No integrations matched your search, the integration you want to set up might not be available to set up via the UI yet.

ignore.confirm_ignore: Are you sure you don't want to set up this integration? You can undo this by clicking the 'Show ignored integrations' in the overflow menu on the top right.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: This will make the integration appear in your discovered integrations again when it gets discovered. This might require a restart or take some time.

config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Restart FLH HomeX to finish reloading this integration

users.users_privileges_note: The user group feature is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.

editor.system_generated_users_not_removable: Unable to remove system generated users.

node_query_stages.protocolinfo: Obtaining basic Z-Wave capabilities of this node from the controller
node_query_stages.probe: Checking if the node is awake/alive
node_query_stages.wakeup: Setting up support for wake-up queues and messages
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific1: Obtaining manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeinfo: Obtaining supported command classes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeplusinfo: Obtaining Z-Wave+ information from the node
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific2: Obtaining additional manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.versions: Obtaining information about firmware and command class versions
node_query_stages.instances: Obtaining details about what instances or channels a device supports
node_query_stages.static: Obtaining static values from the device
node_query_stages.cacheload: Loading information from the OpenZWave cache file. Battery nodes will stay at this stage until the node wakes up.
node_query_stages.neighbors: Obtaining a list of the node's neighbors
node_query_stages.session: Obtaining infrequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.dynamic: Obtaining frequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.configuration: Obtaining configuration values from the node

refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
refresh_node.description: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
refresh_node.battery_note: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
refresh_node.wakeup_instructions_source: Wake-up instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.

details.driverallnodesqueriedsomedead: All nodes have been queried. Some nodes were found dead
details.driverawakenodesqueries: All awake nodes have been queried
details.driverfailed: Failed to connect to Z-Wave controller

select_instance.introduction: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
select_instance.none_found: We couldn't find an OpenZWave instance. If you believe this is incorrect, check your OpenZWave and MQTT setups and ensure that FLH HomeX can communicate with your MQTT broker.

node_config.introduction: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
node_config.help_source: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
node_config.wakeup_help: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Devices will show up here once discovered.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
clusters.introduction: Klynger er byggesteinane for Zigbee-funksjonaliteten. Dei sepererar funksjonaliteten i logiske einingar. Det er klient- og servertyper, som består av attributtar og kommandoar.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

device_pairing_card.INITIALIZED_status_text: The device is ready to use

groups.caption: Grupper
groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
groups.create_group_details: Enter the required details to create a new zigbee group

group_binding.group_picker_help: Vel ei gruppe for å sende bindekommandoen til.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Vel klynga som skal bindast til den valde gruppa.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Huk den merka gruppa til den merka einingsklynga.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Huk av den merka gruppa frå den merka einingsklynga.

ozw.introduction: Denne vegvisaren vil hjelpe deg å migrere frå den eldre Z-Wave-integrasjonen til OpenZWave-integrasjonen som for augneblinken er i beta.

network_management.introduction: Køyr kommandoar som påverkar Z-wave-nettverket. Du kjem ikkje til å få tilbakemelding om kommandoande lukkast, men du kan sjekke i OZW-loggen, og prøve å finne ut av det.

node_management.introduction: Køyr Z-Wavekommando som påverker ei enkel node. Vel ei node for å sjå listene med tilgjengelege kommandoar.
node_management.nodes_hint: Vel node å vise i per-nodevala
node_management.exclude_entity: Ekskluder denne oppføringa frå FLH HomeX

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: Dette kan ta ei stund, avhengig av storleiken på nettverket
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Vakne noder er etterspurt. Sovande noder vert spurt når dei vaknar.

dashboard.introduction: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
dashboard.dump_debug: Download a dump of your network to help diagnose issues
dashboard.dump_dead_nodes_title: Some of your devices are dead
dashboard.dump_dead_nodes_text: Some of your devices didn't respond and are assumed dead. These will not be fully exported.
dashboard.dump_not_ready_title: Not all devices are ready yet
dashboard.dump_not_ready_text: If you create an export while not all devices are ready, you could miss needed data. Give your network some time to query all devices. Do you want to continue with the dump?

node_config.introduction: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
node_config.attribution: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
node_config.battery_device_notice: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
node_config.set_param_queued: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.

add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Device
add_node.controller_in_inclusion_mode: Your Z-Wave controller is now in inclusion mode.
add_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
add_node.inclusion_failed: The device could not be added. Please check the logs for more information.
add_node.interview_started: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
add_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

S2_Unauthenticated.title: S2 Unauthenticated
S2_Unauthenticated.description: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included

S2_Authenticated.title: S2 Authenticated
S2_Authenticated.description: Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems

S2_AccessControl.title: S2 Access Control
S2_AccessControl.description: Example: Door Locks and Garage Doors

S0_Legacy.title: S0 Legacy
S0_Legacy.description: Example: Legacy Door Locks without S2 support

remove_node.title: Remove a Z-Wave device
remove_node.introduction: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from FLH HomeX.
remove_node.controller_in_exclusion_mode: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
remove_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
remove_node.exclusion_failed: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
remove_node.exclusion_finished: Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.

remove_failed_node.title: Remove a Failed Z-Wave Device
remove_failed_node.introduction: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
remove_failed_node.in_progress: The device removal is in progress.
remove_failed_node.removal_finished: Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
remove_failed_node.removal_failed: The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.

reinterview_node.title: Re-interview a Z-Wave Device
reinterview_node.introduction: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
reinterview_node.in_progress: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

heal_network.title: Heal your Z-Wave Network
heal_network.introduction: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
heal_network.traffic_warning: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
heal_network.in_progress: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
heal_network.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
heal_network.healing_failed: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
heal_node.introduction: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
heal_node.traffic_warning: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
heal_node.healing_failed_check_logs: Additional information may be available in the logs.
heal_node.network_heal_in_progress: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.

logs.title: Z-Wave JS Logs
logs.subscribed_to_logs: Subscribed to Z-Wave JS Log Messages…
